name: DC 230/DC 300 - Ceccotti Collezioni
description: Designed by Vincenzo De Cotiis in 2012, the DC 230/300 Sofas reinterpret the classic art of capitonn√© upholstery with a modern flair. Supported by a solid wooden base, these sofas feature a streamlined frame with a comfortable seating area, encouraging relaxation in a leisurely setting. The back is finished with curved plywood covered in deep brown or black leather. Offered in fabrics, leather, or natural leather coverings, each sofa provides various customization options and is available in two sizes. Pair it with the DC 145 armchair for a harmonious living space arrangement.
